pageContext.description:
Having troubles with images on your Shopify theme's sections? They are not looking properly responsive on mobile? It looks broken or cut off?

Don't worry - this section coded by a certified Shopify Partner will make all of your images fully responsive across every browser and device. It's 100% free as well.

Just type 0 on the "Name a fair price" field and get your free copy.

Installation:

Installation instructions can be found here. 

Features:
Consider taking a look at Responsive Banner Pro (click here) as well with many more features that are customizable via the Customize page. Some features are:

✓ Lazyloading to improve performance

✓ add a link to redirect on click

✓ open link on new tab or same page

✓ use an image for desktop and a different one for mobile devices

✓ controllable top margin/spacing

✓ controllable top margin/spacing


It works out of the box with any theme.


Thank you!
